# nonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy

**Instance Property**

The strategy used by an encoder when it encounters exceptional floating-point values.

## Declaration

```swift
var nonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy: JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default strategy is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/JSONEncoder/NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy-swift.enum/throw] strategy.

## Encoding Exceptional Numbers

- **JSONEncoder.NonConformingFloatEncodingStrategy**: The strategies for encoding nonconforming floating-point numbers, also known as IEEE 754 exceptional values.
